articles.title: Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to November 2 Factory of KPA
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to November 2 Factory of KPA
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA) Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, gave field guidance to the November 2 Factory of the KPA.
					 He went round the newly built room dedicated to the history of the factory.
					
					 He said that the room was arranged well, adding the factory has a long history.
					
					 Going round the zeppole, bread and confectionery workshops and other places of the factory, he learned in detail about the technical updating of production processes and production there.
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the officials and employees of the factory put all production processes on an automatic and unmanned basis ranging from preparation of foodstuff to production and packing of products to carry out the tasks assigned by the party.
					
					 The greatest achievement made by the factory is that it completed by its own efforts and with indigenous technology the updating of technical processes even those countries which claim developed in food industry dare not to do.
					
					 He highly appreciated the feats the technicians of the factory and teachers and researchers of Pyongyang University of Mechanical Engineering have performed by most accurately implementing the line of the party on updating the production processes in such a manner as to fully ensure the hygienic safety of foodstuff, cut down manpower and drastically reduce production cost.
					
					 "The scientific and technological achievements made by the factory prove that it is possible to bring about world-startling miracle and innovations when high technical goals are set as required by the era of the knowledge-based economy and its employees are powerfully encouraged to hit them", he said, instructing other foodstuff factories to earnestly learn from the experience gained by it.
					
					 He emphasized the need for the factory to work hard to attain a higher goal of putting the production environment on a sterilized and dust-free basis, not resting content with the successes already achieved.
					
					 He repeatedly expressed his satisfaction, saying that he was pleased to look round the factory and that it was the one to be proud of, it was impeccable in all aspects, and it was the factory he liked to visit.
					
					 He earnestly instructed the officials of the factory to increase the production of varieties of tasty and nutritious foodstuff for soldiers in the future too.
					
					 He was accompanied by KPA Vice Marshal Hwang Pyong So, director of the KPA General Political Bureau, KPA Col. General So Hong Chan, first vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, and Han Kwang Sang, department director of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: National Meeting Observes 54th Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Songun Revolutionary Leadership
articles.content:
National Meeting Observes 54th Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Songun Revolutionary Leadership
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- There took place a national meeting on Sunday at the April 25 House of Culture to mark the 54th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 Present at the meeting were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Ri Yong Gil, Hyon Yong Chol and other senior officials of the party, state and army, chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials of institutions and industrial establishments in Pyongyang, labor innovators and Pyongyangites.
					
					 KPA General Ri Yong Gil, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and chief of the General Staff of the KPA, made a report.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's inspection of the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the KPA on August 25, Juche 49 (1960) marked an historic event heralding the fresh start of the WPK's Songun revolutionary leadership, the reporter said, and went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il clarified the philosophy on arms that the revolution is pioneered, advances and is accomplished by dint of arms and the principle of Songun that the army precisely means the party, state and people. He also formulated the Songun politics as the most powerful, main political mode under socialism in the present era.
					
					 The Songun revolutionary idea of the WPK the validity and the scientific accuracy of which were clearly proved in the rigorous and arduous struggle is fully displaying its attraction and vitality as the days go by. It is also shedding its rays before the whole world as the encyclopedic Songun revolutionary idea giving perfect answers to all the theoretic and practical issues required by the era and the revolution.
					
					 The reporter underlined the need to thoroughly establish the unitary commanding system of respected Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un within the whole army, make it politically, ideologically and morally stronger and firmly train all its service personnel to be a-match-for-a-hundred fighters and Mt. Paektu tiger-like ones with Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's military strategies and tactics, heroic fighting spirit and perfect ability for fighting a real war.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The People's Army should always take the lead in achieving the great army-people unity and displaying the might of army-people coordinated operations and demonstrate its honor as the standard-bearer and shock brigade in carrying out the plan of the supreme commander for building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 Those in the field of national defence industry should produce quality Korean-style ultra-modern weapons and equipment at the best level to raise the level of modernization of the weapons and equipment of the People's Army, and further consolidate the all-people, nation-wide defence system to turn the whole country into an impregnable fortress.
					
					 All the officials, party members and other people should regard their work sites as outposts for defending socialism and raise a stronger wind of the campaign for creating the new Korean speed by learning from the fighting spirit and creative work style displayed by the People's Army, thus foiling the moves of the imperialists to isolate and stifle the DPRK and bringing about a radical turn in the building of an economic power.
					
					 If the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet warmongers finally ignite a nuclear war, the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK will make them bitterly realize what a true war is like and how miserable end those who are fond of playing with fire will meet, and accomplish without fail the historic cause of national reunification, the long-cherished desire of the Korean nation, by dint of arms of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Immensely rosy is the future of the service personnel and people of the DPRK and the final victory is in store for them as the great Juche idea and the Songun revolutionary idea is clearly indicating the road to be followed by them and there is the outstanding and tested leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, the reporter concluded.

articles.title: DPRK Has Right to Mount Preemptive Strike: Minju Joson
articles.content:
DPRK Has Right to Mount Preemptive Strike: Minju Joson
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The right to mount a preemptive strike is not a monopoly of the U.S. and south Korean warmongers. The DPRK, too, has the right to preemptive strike. Minju Joson Sunday says in a commentary.
					 Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces describe as "annual and defensive ones" are nuclear war drills for invading the north, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					  The "tailored deterrence strategy" the puppet forces agreed upon with the U.S. last year is an open scenario for igniting a nuclear war against the north, which calls for mounting a preemptive strike with latest war hardware including nuclear weapons on the basis of "judgment" of "the north's signs of the use of nuclear weapons". The danger of the strategy lies in that the U.S. "judges" as it wishes the "signs of the north's use of nuclear weapons".
					
					 Demanding the U.S. and puppet warmongers to stop UFG to which the strategy is applied, the DPRK served repeated warnings that if a fire sparks against the DPRK, it will reduce the White House, Chongwadae and other citadels of aggression into a sea of flames.
					
					 Whatever we were determined to do has been carried out.
					
					 The U.S. and puppet warmongers had better clearly understand who their rival is and stop UFG at once.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Gravity of UFG
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Gravity of UFG
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Large-scale Ulji Freedom Guardian (UFG) joint military exercises being staged by the U.S. and the south Korean war-like forces are pushing the situation on the Korean peninsula to an extreme pitch of tension once again, says Rodong Sinmun Sunday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The U.S. kicked off such large-scale joint military drills, contrary to the wishes of the Korean nation and the international community for detente and peace on the peninsula. It was prompted by the sinister attempt of the U.S. to justify and perpetuate its military presence in south Korea.
					
					 What the U.S. is seeking is to make the peninsula the biggest hotspot by creating extreme instability there through such military provocation as UFG and to perpetuate its aggressor forces' presence in south Korea under the signboard of "defense of peace".
					
					 The kick-off of UFG is a product of the treacherous act of the south Korean puppet group of traitors zealously joining the U.S. in its moves to perpetuate its troops' presence in south Korea, obsessed with depending on the U.S.
					
					 It is the invariable intention of the south Korean puppet forces to attain its ambition for invading the north with the backing of the U.S. 
					
					 The puppet ruling quarters are imploring the U.S. to keep its aggressor forces in south Korea, clinging to its sleeves. This is an intolerable act of treachery to do harm to the fellow countrymen in the north by unleashing a war against it through the military tie-ups with the American master.
					
					 Absolutely intolerable are the above-said moves of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet ruling forces.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries Accused of Visiting Yasukuni Shrine
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries Accused of Visiting Yasukuni Shrine
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- State heavyweights of Japan including the minister of Internal Affairs recently took the lead in visiting the Yasukuni Shrine in group.
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Sunday accuses the Japanese reactionaries of trying to revive the era of the past Empire by putting forward and praising war criminals through the visit to the shrine.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 What they are seeking is to make not some limited persons but all Japanese visit the shrine and more thoroughly prepare them to be militarists to drive them into overseas aggression.
					
					 That is why the ultra conservative politicians of Japan are visiting the shrine despite protest and denunciation of the international community.
					
					 Not the sense of guilt but the militarist idea to inherit the "soul" of the war criminals is being instilled into the Japanese people due to the Japanese reactionaries' persistent moves to spread the militarist idea through the visit to the shrine.
					
					 No one can vouch that the rising generation of Japan who are armed through education in the militarist idea would not repeat the past crime-woven history.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries should see the reality with cool head. Many countries are following Japan with heightened vigilance.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries would be well advised to clearly understand that the only way of remaining as a member nation of the international society is to break away the inglorious past.

articles.title: Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Military Attaches Corps
articles.content:
Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Military Attaches Corps
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket and a congratulatory letter from the military attaches corps here on the occasion of the 54th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 They were handed over to General of the Korean People's Army Hyon Yong Chol, minister of the People's Armed Forces, Sunday by Hassan Reza Husseini, military attache of the Iranian embassy who is doyen of the military attaches corps.

articles.title: Military Attaches Corps Visits KPA Museum of Weapons and Equipment
articles.content:
Military Attaches Corps Visits KPA Museum of Weapons and Equipment
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The military attaches corps here Sunday visited the Museum of Weapons and Equipment of the Korean People's Army (KPA) on the occasion of the 54th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 Being briefed on undying Songun revolutionary feats performed by the peerless great men of Mt. Paektu in building the powerful national defense industry.
					
					 Hassan Reza Husseini, military attache of the Iranian embassy who is doyen of the corps, wrote in the visitor's book:
					
					 Through the visit I have come to know well about the undying efforts made by the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un in developing the self-defensive industry of the DPRK.
					
					 The weapons and equipment the Korean People's Army is possessed of under the care of the peerless great men are playing an important role in the struggle to defend the sovereignty of the country and dignity of the nation.
					
					 I wish the army and people of the DPRK greater successes in the efforts to build a thriving socialist nation under the wise guidance of HE Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: DPRK Bags Gold Medal at Youth Olympic Games
articles.content:
DPRK Bags Gold Medal at Youth Olympic Games
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Pak Jong Ju, a weightlifter of the DPRK's April 25 Sports Team, won a gold medal in the men's 62kg weightlifting of the Second Youth Olympic Games.
					 He lifted 263kg in total, 7kg more than his Thai rival who came second in the event.
					
					 The DPRK earned a gold medal at the First Youth Olympic Games in 2010, too, when its player Kim Song Chol took the men's 62kg weightlifting title.
					
					 Pak Jong Ju began to learn weightlifting at Nyongbyon County Juvenile Sports School in North Phyongan Province of the country.
					
					 He had already bagged gold and silver medals at the 2013 World Juvenile Weightlifting Championships.
					
					 Experts said that he is a promising talented weightlifter, well prepared in physical and technical aspects.

articles.title: History of Songun Leadership in DPRK
articles.content:
History of Songun Leadership in DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- It has been 54 years since Generalissimo Kim Jong Il started his Songun (Army-first) revolutionary leadership on August 25, 1960.
					 With the anniversary, the people in the DPRK are recalling with deep emotion the glorious history of the Songun revolution in Korea.
					
					 Songun was a fixed principle and a mode of revolutionary struggle maintained by Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in their whole life.
					
					 Kim Il Sung founded the Korean People's Revolutionary Army, the first armed forces in Korea, and defeated the formidable Japanese and U.S. imperialists in one generation. He trained the Korean People's Army to be a-match-for-a hundred armed forces and put all the people under arms and turned the whole country into a fortress, thus providing a powerful military guarantee for the country's sovereignty and the nation's eternal prosperity.
					
					 Setting it as his lifelong mission to carry forward to completion the Songun revolutionary cause pioneered by Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il had led the Korean revolution always to victory with his rare wisdom, distinguished commanding art and matchless courage.
					
					 He wisely guided the work to turn the KPA into an army of the leader and party under the banner of modeling the entire army on Kimilsungism.
					
					 When the imperialists' anti-DPRK moves reached an extreme, he pursued the Songun politics in all aspects to put forward the KPA as the main forces of the revolution and bolster up the nation's defence capabilities.
					
					 He made a ceaseless journey to visit every military post in the country and devoted all his possible efforts to updating the nation's defence industry.
					
					 The great Generalissimos' cause of Songun has been creditably carried forward by Marshal Kim Jong Un. His continued inspection of the military units and posts gives great courage and strength to all the men and officers of the KPA.
					
					 The servicepersons and civilians in the DPRK are now hardening their will to dynamically advance along the road of the Songun revolution, rallied closer around their supreme leader Kim Jong Un, for the eternal prosperity of Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Days to Be Marked in Syria
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Days to Be Marked in Syria
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee of the Socialist Unionist Party of Syria for celebrating the 66th anniversary of the DPRK and the 69th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea was formed on Aug. 12.
					 General Secretary of the party Adnan Ismail was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize diverse celebration and solidarity events on the occasion of the above-said anniversaries.

articles.title: Foreign Media Mark Anniversary of Korea's Liberation
articles.content:
Foreign Media Mark Anniversary of Korea's Liberation
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Foreign media carried special write-ups on the occasion of the 69th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 The Lao paper KPL News on August 15 carried an article titled "Korea's liberation, turning point of history" illustrated with a portrait of smiling President Kim Il Sung. It went on:
					
					 August 15, 1945 was a historic turning point for the Korean people. Thanks to the liberation of the country its people could lead an independent and dignified life as masters of their own destiny, freed from the Japanese imperialists' colonial slavery.
					
					 Kim Il Sung led the 15 year-long anti-Japanese armed struggle to victory, liberated Korea and successfully accomplished the cause of building the party and state.
					
					 The Uruguayan paper La Juventud on the same day carried a similar article illustrated with his photo.
					
					 The Bangladeshi paper The Daily Folk in an article titled "Benefactor of liberation" on August 12 stressed that his exploits will always be enshrined in the hearts of the Korean people and progressives.
					
					 The Guinean Domestic, International and Seven National Languages Broadcasting Services on August 14 said that the reality of the DPRK in which fresh leaping forward and innovations are being made in building a thriving socialist nation helped one recollect again the historical meaning of Korea's liberation which provided a turning point in hewing out the independent destiny of the people and achieving the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Marked by Russian Media
articles.content:
Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Marked by Russian Media
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Russian media carried or posted special write-ups on August 14 and 15 on the occasion of the 69th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 Posted on the website of the Group for Solidarity with the DPRK was articles titled "Comrade Kim Il Sung and Korea's liberation" and "All-people resistance for national liberation" illustrated with his photos during the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					
					 Also posted there was immortal revolutionary paean "Song of General Kim Il Sung".
					
					 President Kim Il Sung embarked upon the road of the revolution carrying with the great intention to retake the country in his teens, led the anti-Japanese armed struggle, defeated the Japanese imperialists and saved the destiny of the country and nation, the articles said.
					
					 Posted on the websites of the Kirov Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Crimean Association for the Study of the Juche Idea, internet magazine Mar 12 and internet TV Krasnoe Televidenie were articles praising him for achieving the historic cause of national liberation and turning the DPRK into a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defense.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Songun Leadership Feats Praised by Russian Papers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Songun Leadership Feats Praised by Russian Papers
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Russian papers carried special write-ups illustrated with the portrait of smiling leader Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the Day of the Songun in the DPRK.
					 The 20-26th issue of Pravda Primoriya in an article titled "Day of Songun in DPRK" said:
					
					 On August 25, 1960 Kim Jong Il visited the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the Korean People's Army, an event of weighty significance.
					
					 Making long journeys of Songun till the last moments of his life, he trained the Korean People's Army into the matchless army and bolstered up the military power of the country in every way, providing a firm military guarantee for the victory of the socialist cause.
					
					 By leading to victory the struggle for defending socialism in the most rigorous international circumstance, he aroused the army and people of the DPRK to the efforts to build a thriving nation.
					
					 The eye-opening reality of the DPRK invincible with single-minded unity, strong with self-defence and prospering with the industrial revolution in the new century would be unthinkable apart from his Songun leadership feats.
					
					 The feats he performed by laying the eternal foundation for the prosperity of the country and nation with his outstanding and tested Songun leadership will remain shining in history.
					
					 Nakhodkinski Rabochi and Rio Panorama on August 20 carried articles dealing with his Songun leadership feats and the victories won by the army and the people of the DPRK in the confrontation with the U.S. imperialists under the unfurled banner of Songun.

articles.title: Day of Songun Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Day of Songun Marked Abroad
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Events took place in various countries to mark the Day of Songun in the DPRK.
					 They included a lecture and photo exhibition in Guinea and a book exhibition and film show in Nigeria and Iran on Aug. 18 and 19.
					
					 Displayed there were photos showing the Songun leadership exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Works of the peerless great men of Mt. Paektu and photos and books introducing Songun Korea were also on show.
					
					 Films shown included Korean film "Arms of Korea".
					
					 The director general of the Kim Il Sung Institute of Agricultural Science in Guinea said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il enriched the Songun idea founded by Kim Il Sung, father of socialist Korea, and established the political mode based on Songun.
					
					 He perfectly prepared the Korean People's Army politically and ideologically and in military technique and bolstered up the military power of the country at the highest level by paying primary attention to developing the national defence industry.
					
					 So, the KPA developed into a matchless army with strong nuclear deterrence.
					
					 A Guinean personage said the exploits Kim Jong Il performed by providing an eternal foundation for the prosperity of the country and nation with his outstanding and tested leadership will remain shining along with the Day of Songun.
					
					 The director of the sci-tech department of the Ministry of Education in Yobe State, Nigeria praised Kim Jong Il for performing great undying exploits on behalf of the country and revolution, the era and history, holding aloft the banner of Songun.
					
					 After watching a Korean film, the director of a company in Iran said he more keenly realized that the DPRK has become a political and military power that no one dares provoke, thanks to the Songun politics.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises Condemned by Danish Personage
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises Condemned by Danish Personage
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association demands the U.S. and its allies stop at once the war drills on the Korean peninsula.
					 Anders Kristensen, chairman of the association, noted this in a statement on August 18.
					
					 Despite the repeated warnings served by the DPRK to stop war drills that may render the situation on the peninsula extremely tense, the U.S. kicked off the joint war drills together with the south Korean puppet forces, the statement said, adding:
					
					 The U.S. seeks to stifle the DPRK by force of arms and disturb its economic development by staging the mad-cap nuclear war drills with a lot of WMDs and troops involved.
					
					 The war drills are, from A to Z, aimed to "change the power in the north".
					
					 The U.S. has staged the war drills in an evermore undisguised manner under the excuse of "nuclear threat" from the north.
					
					 This will only result in escalating tensions on the Korean peninsula and in the rest of Northeast Asia

articles.title: British Organizations Release Joint Statement on Day of Songun in DPRK
articles.content:
British Organizations Release Joint Statement on Day of Songun in DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- British progressive organizations including the Korean Friendship Association UK released a joint statement on Aug. 16 on the occasion of the Day of Songun in the DPRK.
					 The statement said:
					
					 August 25 is a significant day which marks the 54th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership by giving field guidance to the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 He faithfully carried forward the Juche-based cause of building the armed forces and the Songun revolutionary leadership pioneered by President Kim Il Sung, developed the heroic Korean People's Army into the invincible revolutionary forces perfect in terms of weaponry and equipment and in the political and ideological aspects over the past 50 years.
					
					  Under the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il the KPA reliably defended the gains of socialism and the DPRK turned into a military power capable of shattering any aggression.
					
					 The great Songun revolutionary line and traditions are being successfully carried forward by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 We are glad to celebrate the 54th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership, sincerely wishing the Korean people successes in the future, too.
